docs.snippet: Excessive noise takes a costly toll on learning and on health, Arline Bronzaft, an environmental psychologist, argues....
docs.lead_paragraph: Excessive noise takes a costly toll on learning and on health, Arline Bronzaft, an environmental psychologist, argues.
docs.abstract: Clyde Haberman Breaking Bread column with environmental psychologist and GrowNYC board member Arline L Bronzaft discusses effects of excessive noise on New Yorkers; Bronzaft argues that noise issues take costly toll on learning and health.

headline.seo: Arline Bronzaft Seeks a Less Noisy New York
headline.main: Raising Her Voice in Pursuit of a Quieter City
headline.print_headline: Raising Her Voice in Pursuit of a Quieter City
